QueryViewSpec.Name: Inventory Process Low Inventory Output Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Query view (CTE) output format for the low food bank inventory.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Technical Training

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: WITH LOWINVENTORY_CTE (FOODBANKID, FOODITEMID, ITEMCOUNT) AS ( SELECT FBTH.FOODBANKID, FBTD.FOODITEMID, sum(case when FBTH.FOODBANKTXTYPECODE = 0 then FBTD.QUANTITY else FBTD.QUANTITY * -1 end) as FOODITEMCOUNT FROM dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXHEADER FBTH JOIN dbo.USR_FOODBANKTXDETAIL FBTD on FBTH.ID = FBTD.FOODBANKTXHEADERID GROUP BY FBTH.FOODBANKID, FBTD.FOODITEMID ) SELECT C.ID, C.NAME, FI.NAME as FOODITEMNAME, FI.LOWINVENTORYTHRESHOLD, CTE.ITEMCOUNT as CURRENTINVENTORY, (FI.LOWINVENTORYTHRESHOLD - CTE.ITEMCOUNT) as INVENTORYSHORTAGE from LOWINVENTORY_CTE CTE join dbo.CONSTITUENT C on CTE.FOODBANKID = C.ID join dbo.USR_FOODITEM FI on CTE.FOODITEMID = FI.ID where CTE.ITEMCOUNT < FI.LOWINVENTORYTHRESHOLD
